alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 3:27PM EST until December 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 5 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Yates, Seneca, southern Cayuga, Steuben, Schuyler and Chemung counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice and snow will be heavy and wet which could bring down branches. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates
